item.title: About
item.description: m-spangenberg.github.io is my web-log for art, code, and mechanical projects. It is a place for me to tie together loose ends, log my progress, and learn new skills. A lot of what I post here are observations and notes on topics I find interesting, so this web-log also serves as documentation for niche things I tend to easily forget. If you like what you see, subscribe to the RSS feed for updates as I post them.
